definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. [[עׂ֫רָה]] Is 32:11 (‖[[פְּשׁׂ֫טָה]]; acc. to Ges:§ 110 k Hi De al. ms. with fpl. subj.; acc. to Ew:§ 226 a Du Di al. fpl., shortened from [[ערנה]] etc.).

definitions.title: Pō‘
definitions.body: . Pf. 3 pl. [[עוֹרְרוּ אַרְמְנוֹתֶיהָ]] Is 23:13 they have laid bare (the foundations of) her palaces, i.e. destroyed them; so

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[עַרְעֵר תִּתְעַרְעַר]] Je 51:58 be laid utterly bare, cf. [[ערה]]
